entries.name: coverage_level
entries.desc: Output level for the coverage report

entries.name: files_so_far
entries.desc: Count of files parsed during parsing

entries.name: num_files
entries.desc: Total number of files found

entries.name: new(store, num_files, verbosity = 1)
entries.desc: Creates a new Stats that will have num_files.  verbosity defaults to 1 which will create an RDoc::Stats::Normal outputter.

entries.name: add_alias(as)
entries.desc: Records the parsing of an alias as.

entries.name: add_attribute(attribute)
entries.desc: Records the parsing of an attribute attribute

entries.name: add_class(klass)
entries.desc: Records the parsing of a class klass

entries.name: add_constant(constant)
entries.desc: Records the parsing of constant

entries.name: add_file(file)
entries.desc: Records the parsing of file

entries.name: add_method(method)
entries.desc: Records the parsing of method

entries.name: add_module(mod)
entries.desc: Records the parsing of a module mod

entries.name: begin_adding()
entries.desc: Call this to mark the beginning of parsing for display purposes

entries.name: calculate()
entries.desc: Calculates documentation totals and percentages for classes, modules, constants, attributes and methods.

entries.name: coverage_level=(level)
entries.desc: Sets coverage report level.  Accepted values are:

entries.name: doc_stats(collection)
entries.desc: Returns the length and number of undocumented items in collection.

entries.name: done_adding()
entries.desc: Call this to mark the end of parsing for display purposes

entries.name: fully_documented?()
entries.desc: The documentation status of this project.  true when 100%, false when less than 100% and nil when unknown.

entries.name: great_job()
entries.desc: A report that says you did a great job!

entries.name: percent_doc()
entries.desc: Calculates the percentage of items documented.

entries.name: report()
entries.desc: Returns a report on which items are not documented

entries.name: report_attributes(cm)
entries.desc: Returns a report on undocumented attributes in ClassModule cm

entries.name: report_class_module(cm)
entries.desc: Returns a report on undocumented items in ClassModule cm

entries.name: report_constants(cm)
entries.desc: Returns a report on undocumented constants in ClassModule cm

entries.name: report_methods(cm)
entries.desc: Returns a report on undocumented methods in ClassModule cm

entries.name: summary()
entries.desc: Returns a summary of the collected statistics.

entries.name: undoc_params(method)
entries.desc: Determines which parameters in method were not documented.  Returns a total parameter count and an Array of undocumented methods.
